text: Zee and Co. is a 1972 British drama movie. It is also called X, Y and Zee or Zee and Company. It was directed by Brian G. Hutton. The movie is based on the novel by Edna O'Brien. It stars Elizabeth Taylor, Michael Caine, Susannah York and Margaret Leighton. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 drama movies Category:1972 LGBT movies Category:1970s British drama movies
title: Zee and Co.
